extendedInfo.description: Find books, audio books, eBooks, movies, music, and more in the library catalog on your mobile device. With WCL Mobile you can:â¢ Easily search the library catalog using only the first few letters of a word â it searches as you type.â¢ Check your library account to renew items, place holds, and see what you have checked out.â¢ Look up library hours and locations.â¢ Keep up to date on the latest library classes, programs, and events.â¢ Connect with your Washington County Librarian by phone, email, or chat. â¢ Follow the latest Library posts, tweets, and videos on our social networking sites.â¢ Search the library catalog by scanning a bookâs ISBN.Connect with your library anytime, anywhere!

reviews.title: Stupendous!
reviews.comment: ...except I\'d like it to be easier to view the e-books catalog (like 100 at a time)!
reviews.author: eL Dee

reviews.title: Wonderful resource
reviews.comment: I do so much researching. This app brings the card catalogue to my fingertips. This saves time and gas by reducing trips to the library. But, also increases my need and use of libraries. In praise of Libraries and librarians.
reviews.author: A Google User
